colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES LEGS PAR BSHAD PA CHU'I BSTAN BCOS LUGS GNYIS RLABS 'PHRENG BRGYA LDAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGAR RANG GI RGYUD LA BAG CHAGS 'JOG PA'I PHYIR DU RTZOM PA'I KHUL, ,DUS TSOD LA DPAG PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DU BGRANG RUNG TZAM KHA SHAS BRES YOD NA'ANG, SHING GI BSTAN BCOS DE NGAR SO CHE ZHING, ,MTHONG BYED MKHAN MANG DU 'ONG BAR SNANG BAS DE LA 'GREL BA ZHIG KYANG BYUNG NA LEGS ZHES, ,PA RON SU NYID SHOG NAS BSNGAGS 'OS YON TAN DU MA'I RGYA N 'PHRENG 'DZIN PA NOM CHI ZHABS DRUNG SKAL BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL TE BRI BAR BRTZAM YANG, ,@013A *, ,DE'I CHOS KYI SARGA LAm RIM LA LOGS SU MI DGOS LA, GZHAN RNAMS GO SLA BA 'BA' ZHIG GTZOR 'DON DANG, DPE'ANG YONGS GRAGS MKHAS BLUN THAMS CAD LA 'CHAR BA BDE BA KHO NAR SBYAR STABS DE LAS GSAL DU GTONG RGYU MED PA LTA BUR SNANG ZHING, ,PHYOGS MTHUN GYI KHUNGS DPAL MGON KLU SGRUB KYI SHES RAB BRGYA PA, SHES RAB SDONG BU, SKYE BOG SO THIGS GSUM DANG, TZA NA KA RGYAL PO'I LUGS KYI BSTAN BCOS, MA SU RAKshAS BYAS PA'I LUGS KYI BSTAN BCOS, ,NYI MA SPAS PAS MDZAD PA TSIGS SU BCAD PA'I MDZOD, ,MCHOG SRID KYI TSIGS BCAD BRGYA PA, DRI MA MED PA'I DRIS LAM RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA, SA SKYA'I LEGS BSHAD RNAMS DANG, GZHAN YANG 'PHRIN YIG BSLAB BYA SOGS DE MTHUN RNAMS DRANGS TE BSHAD NA TSIG TSOGS CHES LCI BAR 'GYUR BAS, ,'DIR LJON SHING CHU'I KHAMS KYI RGYAS PAR BYED PA'I DPE DANG MTHUN PAR, ,DE NYID MA TSANG BA 'GA' ZHIG KHA BSKANGS NAS CUNG ZAD RGYAS SU BTANG, ,DER MCHOG DMAN DANG GTZO PHAL GYI RIM PAS CHOS KYI SARGA SDON DU BYAS KYANG, ,'DIR GONG NAS GONG DU BGROD PA'I RIM PAS MJUG TU BYAS TE GO RIM PA SDEBS PA SOGS DON 'GREL GYI TSUL DU BYAS NA, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES DBEN GNAS YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GTZUG LAG BLTA BA'I BLO MIG GONG NAS MIG CAN BHI KshU RATNA A'A NANTAS BGYIS PA 'DI'ANG SKYE BO RNAMS LA DGE BA'I MJUG NGOGS GSAL BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA LE SHRE YO BHA BA TU, ,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE LEGS SO, ,)
